Name: Moonshine Martini
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Review: A wet Martini with balanced hints of maraschino and absinthe.
History: Adapted from a recipe in Harry Craddock's 1930 The Savoy Cocktail Book .
Nutrition: One serving of Moonshine Martini contains 180 calories
